subject: Hockey, Ice
Stanley Cup
lead_paragraph: The Chicago Blackhawks and the Boston Bruins both had Cup championships in the last three years, but the forward Jaromir Jagr, 41, had to wait 21 years for another chance.
snippet: The Chicago Blackhawks and the Boston Bruins both had Cup championships in the last three years, but the forward Jaromir Jagr, 41, had to wait 21 years for another chance.
